translations: n.制酸剂；抗酸药（antacid 的复数）

phrs.headword: Poisoning by other antacids and anti-gastric-secretion drugs
phrs.translation: 其他抗酸药和抗胃分泌药中毒

phrs.headword: Adverse effects in therapeutic use, other antacids and anti-gastric-secretion drugs
phrs.translation: 其他抗酸药和抗胃分泌药的有害效应

sentences.sentence: Antacids are alkaline and they relieve pain by neutralizing acid in the contents of the stomach.
sentences.translation: 抗酸剂是碱性的，它们通过中和胃容物中的酸来缓解疼痛。

sentences.sentence: Too much reliance is placed on antacids.
Take antacids right after dinner, not before bed.
sentences.translation: 吃完晚饭，立即服用解酸剂，不要等到睡前再服用。
